example.en: I swore an oath of honour, never to abandon you!
example.vi: Tôi đã thề lời thề danh dự, không bao giờ từ bỏ ngài.

example.en: Please do me the honour of accepting my hand.
example.vi: Hãy cho tôi niềm vinh dự có được sự chấp nhận của cô.

example.en: " The Second Afghan War brought honours and promotion to many.

example.en: We express our deepest respect and honour to them.

example.en: But she is Arashikage and she will fight with honour.

example.en: This is no time for a man of honour to withdraw from public affairs!

example.en: It's a Congressional Medal of Honour.

example.en: He said he loves you, Mr Wooley, and will you do him the honour to be his father?

example.en: We honour him not with tears, but with blood spilled in the arena
